product_name: Patagonia Torrentshell Plus Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia Torrentshell Plus Jacket is a durable full-featured waterproof, breathable rain jacket built for rugged excursions. Abrasion-resistant 2.5-layer nylon ripstop panels across shoulders and sides add durability where you need it most. 2-way adjustable, helmet-compatible hood doesn't inhibit your view, rolls down and stows away when it's not needed. Adjustable drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuff closures keep the wet stuff out. All zippers, including pit zips, are watertight. Full-length front zipper has an interior stormflap. Handwarmer pockets; stuff jacket into one of the handwarmer pockets and use the carabiner clip-in loop when you want it close by. Nice touches: microfleece-lined neck; internal mesh pocket.
short_description: The Patagonia Torrentshell Plus Jacket is a durable full-featured waterproof, breathable rain jacket built for rugged excursions.
